resources.string: Classic compound exercise for building chest, shoulders, and triceps. Performed lying on a flat bench pressing a barbell.
Targets the upper chest with emphasis on clavicular head. Performed on an incline bench at 30-45 degrees.
Focuses on lower chest development. Performed on a decline bench targeting the sternal head of pectoralis major.
Isolation exercise stretching and contracting the chest. Uses dumbbells in an arc motion to maximize pec activation.
Upper chest isolation on incline bench. Emphasizes stretch and contraction of upper pectorals with controlled movement.
Cable exercise for chest isolation. Provides constant tension throughout the movement for optimal muscle engagement.
Bodyweight compound exercise working chest, shoulders, and triceps. Can be modified for difficulty with variations.
Advanced bodyweight exercise emphasizing lower chest and triceps. Requires parallel bars or dip station.
Hybrid movement working chest and lats. Performed with dumbbell across bench, stretching chest and expanding rib cage.
Dumbbell variation of bench press allowing greater range of motion. Requires more stabilization than barbell version.
Machine-based isolation exercise. Provides controlled movement for chest contraction with reduced shoulder involvement.
Compound bodyweight exercise for lats, biceps, and rear delts. Performed with pronated grip pulling body to bar.
Variation of pull-up with supinated grip. Places more emphasis on biceps while still targeting back muscles.
Fundamental rowing movement for back thickness. Performed bent over at hips pulling barbell to lower chest.
Rowing variation using T-bar or landmine setup. Targets middle back with supported torso position.
Unilateral rowing exercise allowing full range of motion. Performed with one hand on bench for support.
Machine-based alternative to pull-ups. Allows control of resistance while targeting lats and upper back.
Seated cable rowing for back development. Provides constant tension throughout pulling motion.
Standing row pulling weight to chin level. Targets upper back, traps, and shoulders with vertical pull.
King of compound exercises working entire posterior chain. Builds back, glutes, and hamstrings with heavy loading.
Horizontal rowing on machine. Targets mid-back with stable seated position allowing focus on contraction.
Bodyweight rowing exercise under bar or table. Adjustable difficulty by changing body angle.
The king of leg exercises. Compound movement building quads, glutes, and hamstrings with barbell on upper back.
Squat variation with barbell held at front shoulders. Emphasizes quads and requires upright torso position.
Machine-based leg exercise allowing heavy loading. Targets quads and glutes with back support.
Isolation exercise for quadriceps. Performed seated extending legs against resistance.
Isolation for hamstrings. Performed lying or seated curling legs against resistance pad.
Unilateral leg exercise stepping forward. Works quads, glutes, and improves balance and coordination.
Single-leg squat with rear foot elevated. Intense quad and glute workout requiring balance and strength.
Hip-hinge movement targeting hamstrings and glutes. Performed with straight legs maintaining slight knee bend.
Deadlift variation focusing on hamstrings and glutes. Maintains slight knee bend with emphasis on hip hinge.
Machine exercise bringing legs together. Targets inner thigh adductor muscles.
Machine exercise pushing legs apart. Targets outer hip and glute muscles.
Wide-stance squat targeting inner thighs and glutes. Performed with toes pointed outward.
Machine squat with angled platform. Reduces lower back stress while effectively targeting quads.
Standing overhead press with barbell. Compound movement for building shoulder strength and size.
Overhead pressing with dumbbells. Allows natural movement pattern and full range of motion.
Isolation exercise for side deltoids. Raising dumbbells to sides for shoulder width development.
Targets front deltoids raising weights forward. Complements pressing movements for front delt development.
Pulling weight vertically to chin. Works shoulders and traps with narrow grip.
Rotating press invented by Arnold Schwarzenegger. Combines press with rotation for complete shoulder activation.
Cable exercise pulling to face level. Targets rear delts and upper back improving posture.
Bent-over fly targeting rear deltoids. Important for balanced shoulder development and posture.
Machine-based rear delt isolation. Provides stable position for focused posterior deltoid work.
Seated overhead press on machine. Stable position allowing focus on shoulder contraction.
Classic bicep exercise with barbell. Standing curl with supinated grip for maximum bicep activation.
Dumbbell curls alternating arms. Allows focus on each bicep independently with natural movement.
Neutral grip dumbbell curl. Targets biceps and brachialis for arm thickness.
Bicep curl on preacher bench. Isolates biceps eliminating momentum with arms supported.
Seated single-arm curl. Maximum isolation and peak contraction for bicep development.
Cable tricep exercise pushing down. Isolates triceps with constant tension throughout movement.
Lying tricep extension lowering weight to forehead. Intense tricep isolation with full stretch.
Overhead tricep extension with dumbbell or cable. Stretches long head of triceps for complete development.
Bodyweight tricep exercise on bench. Scalable difficulty effective for tricep strength and size.
Curl with pronated grip. Targets brachioradialis and forearms along with biceps.
Single-arm tricep exercise leaning forward. Isolation movement for tricep definition.
Bench press with narrow grip. Compound movement emphasizing triceps and inner chest.
Isometric core exercise holding body straight. Builds core stability and endurance engaging entire midsection.
Classic ab exercise flexing spine. Targets rectus abdominis with controlled curling motion.
Lower ab exercise raising legs from hanging or lying position. Intense core activation.
Lateral plank targeting obliques. Builds side core strength and stability holding body sideways.
Dynamic exercise alternating knee drives. Combines cardio with core activation.
Rotational ab exercise for obliques. Seated twisting motion with or without weight.
Advanced ab exercise touching hands to feet. Combines upper and lower ab activation in V shape.
Dynamic sit-up bringing knees and torso together. Full ab contraction in folding motion.
Standing calf exercise on machine. Targets gastrocnemius with full extension and contraction.
Seated calf raise targeting soleus. Performed with knees bent isolating lower calf muscle.
Calf raises performed on leg press. Allows heavy loading for calf development.
Bent-over calf raise with weight on back. Intense stretch and contraction for calves.
Unilateral calf raise. Addresses imbalances and allows full range of motion per leg.
Calf raises on smith machine. Stable barbell path for controlled calf training.
Classic trap exercise shrugging shoulders with barbell. Builds upper trap thickness and strength.
Dumbbell variation of shrugs. Allows natural movement path and unilateral focus.
Vertical pull to chin working traps and shoulders. Narrow grip emphasizes upper trap activation.
Cable pull to face level. Works upper back and traps while improving posture.
Unilateral shrug with dumbbell. Addresses trap imbalances and allows concentrated work.
